name: lone signal
description:
A narrative game exploring the lonesome journey of a space probe through deep space, and the perspectives it finds on the way.

We won’t spoil too much in the description - go ahead and play!

Credits:
- Dan Gomme
- Younès Rabii
- Kyle Worrall (Musical Rearrangement from the original “Horse with No Name” by America)
- Nathan Trouvain (Cover Art)
